attributes.action: demand the BBC to return Jonathan Ross to our screens with immediate effect.  Let the British, license-paying Public decide what they watch!  Audiences are “armed” with the ability to choose – it’s called a remote control.  Let the viewing figures ultimately demonstrate the mood towards this national treasure…. ‘at a time of wecession we need Wossy!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
